Articles.Content:
So In finally got myself into a safeish Mun landing. The Rover... didn't go well... but that's not important. I line up my Kerbals, put down the flag for the photo-op annnnddd.

Jeb goes and plants the flag to line up perfectly with it's own shadow. This naturally renders the bannner completely black. Trying multiple times still aligns the flag to the exact same axis, so my question is. Is there some way to force your Kerbals to plant the flag in the direction you want?
Just right click the flag to take it down, and face your kerbal to the left of where you want to put the flag. Kerbals always want to turn before they put down a flag.
